summary: An example script that demonstrates how to connect to a single cryptocurrency exchange via ccxt.pro and subscribe to several websocket data streams (such as ticker, trades, and order book) concurrently, processing the incoming real‑time data in an asynchronous loop.
business_intent: Show developers how to use ccxt.pro for real‑time market data aggregation from multiple streams of one exchange, enabling the building of trading bots, dashboards, or analytics tools that require simultaneous live feeds.
